description: Transliteration of "oh yeah". Also written as 噢耶, 哦也, 欧yeah.

examples.translation: Let's party together, oh yeah yeah yeah

examples.chinese: 太爽了明天没课,不用早起了欧耶
examples.translation: So cool, no class tomorrow, no need to wake up early, oh yeah

examples.chinese: 欧耶,下班了奖励自己,打算大买特买
examples.translation: Oh yeah, rewarding myself after work, planning to shop til I drop
